com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.layers.layerOperations
Interface InfoByPoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
FLayerFileVectorial, FLayerGenericVectorial, FLayers, FLayerVectorialDB, FLyrAnnotation, FLyrVect, Topology, VoronoiAndTinInputLyr
public interface InfoByPoint

Interface that must be implemented by layers which support the operation "information by point".

That operation allows get meta-information from a point and an area around, of a layer.

Method Summary
 XMLItem[] getInfo(java.awt.Point p, double tolerance, Cancellable cancel)
          Executes a consultation about information of a point on the layer.
 

Method Detail

getInfo

XMLItem[] getInfo(java.awt.Point p,
                  double tolerance,
                  Cancellable cancel)
                  throws ReadDriverException,
                         VisitorException,
                         LoadLayerException

Executes a consultation about information of a point on the layer.

There is an area around the point where will got the information.

Parameters:
p - point where is the consultation
tolerance - permissible margin around the coordinates of the point where the method will got the information. Each singular implementation of this method would use it in a different way. The coordinates also depend on the implementation.
cancel - shared object that determines if this layer can continue being drawn
Returns:
an array with XML items that have the information of that point
Throws:
DriverException - any exception produced using the driver.
ReadDriverException
VisitorException
LoadLayerException
